Workshops

Short, powerful workshops that target specific technical skills.

Monthly Workshops

Workshops typically last a 1 or 2 days. You gain competencies that can be immediately applied on the job.

Terminal Velocity

Learn how to automate, configure, and customize your environment and applications with shell scripts.

Debugging With Power

Master diagnosing, debugging, and evaluating your UI with the Developer Tools.

Flex Your CSS

Implement responsive, sophisticated layouts with CSS grid and flexbox.

Giteration

Learn git to understand the foundations of branching, merging, commits, rollbacks, patches, and more.

Container Explainer

Learn the basics of containerization for a local development environment.

Stepping Stone Labs

Reignite your passion for learning and accelerate your growth
